resources.string: How to make a good route?

The very first marker is already placed for you on the map on your current location. This is the place where the route will start. You can of course delete this marker by clicking on it. And choose another starting point.

If there are some places which you want to see during your run, you can add a marker at that spot. To make a good route, it is handy to place your markers mostly at intersection points of the streets. You will see immediately the length of the route between the markers and this app will automatically calculate the distance back to your starting point and draw a line. It is also possible to drag your marker and put it somewhere else on the map. Your route will be drawn in the order of the set markers. Do not forget to enter your goal to see this while you are running.
If you still have some questions, contact me! Click on the info button for more contact info.
StreetView is not available for this location
